title: [Epidemiology] After two doses, the Pfizer-BioNTech COVID-19 vaccine induces strong immune response against the original coronavirus and the alpha variant. Although the antibody response against the beta variant was weaker, the vaccine creates neutralizing antibodies that give relatively good protection.
[Psychology] Objectively measured digital technology use during the COVID-19 pandemic: Impact on depression, anxiety, and suicidal ideation among young adults
